sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from "react"; import {IUser} from "./IUser"; interface IProps {} interface IState { user:IUser } let Registration:React.FC =() =>{ let [userState,setUserState] = useState({ user:{ username:'', email: '', password: '', designation : '', bio : '', terms : false, } }); let updateInput =(event:React.ChangeEvent | HTMLTextAreaElement |HTMLSelectElement) =>{ setUserState({ user:{ ...userState.user, [event.target.name]:event.target.value } }); }; return( {/* 
{JSON.stringify(this.state.user)}
*/}

Registration
